aboutMe.title: about me
aboutMe.subtitle: Who am I?
aboutMe.p2: I’m a Fullstack Developer based in Ceará, Brazil. I can develop responsive websites and scalable APIs from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
aboutMe.p3_part1: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into software has been my passion for over
aboutMe.p3_part2: years. I have been helping various projects and companies to establish their presence online using the modern JavaScript ecosystem. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

tech.description: Development of Desktop Software, Web Full-Stack foundations & Database basics.

university.description: Focusing on Software Architecture, Data Persistence, and Validation algorithms.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.desc: I’m interested in full-time opportunities and freelance projects. However, if you have any other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me.
